hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.GV GS Pillar: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #the Mirror Shield# and #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key Ring#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Fishing Pond#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Magic Meter#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #a Jail Key Ring# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path First Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that invisible ghosts can be exposed with Deku Nuts.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Bow#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##the Forest Temple## has #1# major item.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #flames in the royal tomb# reveal #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Blue Fire Arrows#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #a Zora Scale# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #3# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #the Key#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: I am @, hero of the Gossip Stones! Hear my name and tremble!

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LH (Lab).text: They say that racing #Damp's ghost# rewards...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Magic Meter#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Megaton Hammer#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that plundering #Dodongo's Cavern# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Skull Kid# grants #a Bomb Bag#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #a Zora Scale#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Compass# and #the Song of Time#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Blue Fire Arrows#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #outside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Megaton Hammer#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Hookshot# and #a Deku Shield#.
